title: Write SEO-Friendly Article
description: A reporter is writing an article on a popular topic and needs to ensure it is optimized to rank well in search engine results.

tasks.description: Use an SEO tool to research the most common keywords and phrases people use when searching for this topic.
tasks.expected_outcome: A list of target keywords is generated.

tasks.description: Incorporate the target keywords naturally into the article's headline, subheadings, and body text.
tasks.expected_outcome: The article is optimized for the target keywords.

tasks.description: Write a compelling meta description that includes the primary keyword and will entice users to click from a search results page.
tasks.expected_outcome: An effective meta description is drafted.
